title: Compute and Add a Moving Average Variable
variableSelcted: Select a variable to compute moving average
sampleSize: Specify the size of the group to calculate moving average (e.g. 5)
movingAvgVarName: Specify the name of the moving average variable to add/update (e.g. movingAvg)

help.title: Compute moving average for the variable selected
help.body:
Description

Compute the moving average for the variable selected for the group size specified. Add or modify (if the variable name specified already exists) a variable to the dataset to store the result
